    AddTypyWycieczekButton - Class in com.project.ui.buttons.adding
    The AddTypyWycieczekButton class extends Button and provides the functionality to add a new trip type (TypyWycieczek) into the system, along with its associated pricing information (Ceny) and the assignment of cities for each night of the trip (MiastaWycieczek).
